ProjectTitle: Subject-specific MRI passive shims and receive coils through 3D printing
InitialFeedbackHistory:
15/02/2023
Please note that there is still a comment in your DMP, please correct this in your final DMP that FWO expects at the end of your fellowship, you can already submit an updated DMP as intermediate. 
Please note that FWO now implemented the new Flemish standard DMP template that you can find in DMPonline.be or here: https://www.fwo.be/en/the-fwo/research-policy/data-management-plan/. Please use this template for your future DMPs. 
Documentation: Will you use the DICOM standard which is often used for medical imaging? For more information see: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/documentation-metadata. 
Storage: Please clarify which cloud storage you use, have a look at the storage guide to help you choose: https://icts.kuleuven.be/storagewijzer/en
Sharing: please note that scientific data is not a repository but a journal. Are there any disciplinary repositories in your field, if not you can use KU Leuven RDR, for more information: https://www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/data-sharing
label: good with suggestions
